title: Soft Reset?
body: So is there actually going to be a soft reset this season or not. Personally im not to fussed on having to play 10 provisional games again but thats just my opinion

replies.body: You still have to play the 10 placement games. The soft reset just means that your MMR is pretty much the same as where you ended the season

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VfHU6auN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-17T07:19:51.025+0000)
>
> You still have to play the 10 placement games. The soft reset just means that your MMR is pretty much the same as where you ended the season

It's not the same, it's lower than your mmr from the previous season
its the same as every other season
